title: No DFG - Maxing CDR on AP Assassins
body:
Since Riot announced they are removing DFG in 5.2, I am going to be missing out on that 10% CDR that DFG gives me on the AP assassins that I play (LeBlanc and Syndra).

Currently I use the 5% CDR masteries, 6 CDR glyphs (5% CDR), DFG, and Morello's/Athene's for the max CDR build.

Without DFG in 5.2, I have a 10% CDR void that I need to fill. I am thinking of using 9 scaling CDR glyphs so I get 15% CDR at level 18, which allows me to retain max CDR without going over the limit or anything.

However, this means I miss out on Magic Resist glyphs which does make me consequently more squishy and easier to kill.


Thoughts?

EDIT: Twin Shadows is a more gold-efficient alternative if I want that 10% CDR. I will miss the 120 AP from DFG though. ;-;

replies.body: You could grab the Ghosts instead. They even give you an active that reveals and slows your enemy when they run into a bush.

> You could grab the Ghosts instead. They even give you an active that reveals and slows your enemy when they run into a bush.

Yeah, I was thinking about that and Twin Shadows would work well in this scenario.

I will miss having 120 AP instead of just 80 AP however.

On Syndra, taking Banner of Command might be an option.

On LeBlanc, the previous suggestion of Twin Shadows is a great idea.
